abrpApiKey: <insert your API key for A Better Route Planner here>
abrpToken: <insert your token for A Better Route Planner here>
abrpCarModel: <insert your car model for A Better Route Planner here>
bluetoothPin: <insert the PIN to connect to OBD adapter here>
bluetoothAddress: <insert the MAC Address to OBD adapter here>
homeAssistantMqttServerHost: <insert the hostname of your Home Assistant MQTT Broker here>
homeAssistantMqttUsername: <insert the username of your Home Assistant MQTT Broker here>
homeAssistantMqttPassword: <insert the password of your Home Assistant MQTT Broker here>
